EmailTemplate.description: This is the email sent to a new Vetaran of another Era after they are approved
EmailTemplate.name: UPDATED: Paperwork Approved â€“ Veteran of Other Era
EmailTemplate.subject: Your Service is Confirmed!
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
{!Contact.FirstName},
Thanks for taking the time to send us your paperwork! In addition to letting us verify your service, these documents also help us learn more about our members so that we can make IAVA better.
The documents you provided us indicate that you are a veteran of a previous era.
If this is incorrect in any way, or if you have service records that show service in the area of responsibility for OIF, OEF, or OND, please click here or email myiava@iava.org and we will get it fixed right away.
Best,
Team IAVA
